body.name: Space Explorer Building Blocks, STEM Toys, 6 in 1 Spacecraft Construction Toy Set, Building Kit, Gift for Kids, Boys and Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins
features: 【127 Piece Building Blocks】This STEM Space Explorer set is suitable for children aged 8-12 and features 6 super cool spacecraft models that can be combined into one large spacecraft, providing hours of playtime for your child! Learn while playing, unleash their creativity, and imagination.

【Creative Design 】The finished size of this spacecraft model is 2.5 inches (length) x 2.95 inches (width) x 3.7 inches (height). Each spacecraft comes in separate packaging, and they can be transformed into 2 different styles or assembled together to create a large spacecraft

【Reliable Materials】Every block is durable and made from high-quality ABS plastic, making them more engaging and enjoyable toys for children aged 8 and above. A high-quality gift for boys and girls aged 6-12.

【Easy Assembly and Disassembly】The package includes assembly instructions and disassembly tools, with each step being simple and easy to understand, detailing the corresponding parts and installation steps. Focusing on building the spacecraft can help boys and girls develop their concentration, imagination, and teamwork skills..

【Gifts & Collectibles】Playing with building blocks can enhance logical thinking and creativity, aiding in brain development. Additionally, this building block toy makes a perfect gift for boys, girls, and adults, which you can give to your family and friends on birthdays, Christmas, New Year, or other holidays.

Infinite Creativity, Double the Fun! Explore an endless world of creativity, expand intellectual horizons – the WATSABRO Multifunctional Building Blocks Set is the ideal choice for sparking imagination, suitable not only for children but also as the perfect companion for unwinding.

Parent-Child Interaction, Recognized Resonance This building block set is not just for children; it's a feast of parent-child interaction. Assembling together, parents and children share joy, fostering a closer bond. Meanwhile, the exquisite design allows adults to rediscover their inner child during the creative process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small box, but mighty - 6 mini figures make 1 model a
reviews.reviewText: We got this space ship for a 9 year old boy who has a lot of experience building with Lego blocks.These blocks are similar.The 6in1 set comes individually packaged.Each bag has a corresponding instruction sheet.You will need to match the bags up to the instruction sheet for each one - my kiddo needed help with this as some of the numbers were not printed or readable on the plastic packaging. It was easy enough to figure out based on parts and color of the blocks.Since the pieces are a little smaller than the brand name blocks it was more challenging to put each mini figure together and we had to take some breaks because it was frustrating.Once assembled, we were able to create the larger model, we were impressed with the detail and design.In hindsight I would have given this to one of my older kids to assemble, but our 9 year old was able to finish it with help from an adult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little building set
reviews.reviewText: This cute little building set can build six small vehicles or one big one. They are pretty tiny so I did have to help my 5 year old build them but once they were built he loved playing with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice STEM Set
reviews.reviewText: This is a versatile, albeit surprisingly small, STEM construction set. There are several things to build. The pieces are colorful and well-cut.I’m not sure I agree with the “6+” age suggestion for this, though. The pieces are pretty tiny. Besides the possibility of a choking hazard, I think assembly would be difficult for a child under the age of at least 10.This would work well as a stocking stuffer, given the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nephew loves it
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 6 yr old nephew who loves dinosaurs. His face lit up when he saw it at my house and we had a blast putting it together with each other. I wanted to just go to the big Dino, but he wanted to do the little ones, so the little ones won out. The age states 8, so it was a tad complicating to him, but he pushed through it and his face when he got the Triceratops done was a memory I will not forget, he was absolutely beaming with joy. I definitely would recommend this product to anyone with kids 6-10 to have a fun bonding moment with. I absolutely loved how each little Dino came in its own packet so my nephew could decide which to do. I’m hoping eventually to combine them, but he’s having too much fun taking them apart and putting them back together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My nephew LOVED this
reviews.reviewText: I have a 6-year-old nephew who is obsessed with construction vehicles, this was a small piece of his gift and he spent at least an hour putting it together, taking it apart, and then doing another design! Fun and inexpensive gift, would for sure get it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini Lego projects
reviews.reviewText: Came with 6 small separate bags of building blocks that make 6 different vehicles, make 1 larger excavator when combined, I believe. Great building projects for busy kids. Great price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars kids hated it, wouldn't put it together
reviews.reviewText: My kids love playing with bricks. They are 7 & 8 so it's not like they're noobs here.They said the instructions were confusing and the bricks didn't fit together right. I couldn't get them to even finish the set. Don't recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my nephew who likes both space and Legos. This thing is tiny but cute and fun for kids. For the price I could have gotten a bigger Lego set. With a couple more bucks I probably could've got multiple Lego sets. But this was a pretty unique and educational toy. I will update with more photos once it's built (this is a Christmas gift).
